Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” (1947) and “Farewell” (1979). The first part depicts the Childhood days of Miyazawa as well as his later years when he helps out on his family’s farm, while also tending to numerous shop losses at bottom.
